title: IT services : Major vendors , by revenue per employee
yAxis: Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars for 12 number of It Services Vendors.
The maximum Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars 289474.0 is found at It Services Vendor IBM and the minimum is found at TCS where It Services Vendor is 36350.0.
There is a difference of 253124.0 between the maximum It Services Vendor IBM and minimum It Services Vendor TCS.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars for 12 number of It Services Vendors.
It Services Vendor IBM has the highest Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars and TCS has the lowest Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars for 12 number of It Services Vendors.
The Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars is highest at It Services Vendor IBM and lowest at It Services Vendor TCS.
It Services Vendor ACN has the second highest value for Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars.
The Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars of It Services Vendor TCS is 7.96% smaller than the maximum value at IBM.
The It Services Vendor IBM has the highest Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars, followed by ACN, and Dell. Down to the It Services Vendor TCS which is the lowest.
The It Services Vendor TCS tends to be 2.23 percent lower than average.
The Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars is 1554506.0 if we add up values of all It Services Vendors.
